name: mobile-ffmpeg-full-gpl
summary: Mobile FFmpeg Full GPL Dynamic Framework
description: Includes FFmpeg v4.1-dev-1517 with chromaprint v1.4.3, fontconfig v2.13.1, freetype v2.9.1, fribidi v1.0.5, gmp v6.1.2, gnutls v3.5.19, kvazaar v1.2.0, lame v3.100, libaom v1.0.0-dev-820, libass v0.14.0, libiconv v1.15, libilbc v2.0.2, libtheora v1.1.1, libvid.stab v1.1.0, libvorbis v1.3.6, libvpx v1.7.0, libwebp v1.0.0, libxml2 v2.9.8, opencore-amr v0.1.5, opus v1.3, sdl v2.0.8, shine v3.1.1, snappy v1.1.7, soxr v0.1.3, speex v1.2.0, tesseract v3.05.02, twolame v0.3.13, wavpack v5.1.0, x264 20181015-2245-stable, x265 v2.9 and xvidcore v1.3.5 libraries enabled.
